originalTitle: Suspected carbon-monoxide leak kills at least 30 miners in Nigeria, witnesses say
title: Suspected carbon-monoxide leak kills at least 30 miners in Nigeria, witnesses say
content: The workers are believed to have collapsed after the gas built up in poorly ventilated tunnels.

title: Social media suspended in Gabon for 'spreading of false information'
content: The media regulator said the ban would be in place "until further notice".

title: ‘Board of Peace’: Reality vs Rhetoric
content: Trump's "Board of Peace" is pledging five billion dollars to rebuild Gaza and thousands of foreign troops.

title: 'Difficult' Russia-Ukraine peace talks end without breakthrough

title: Iran security official appears to fire on crowd at cemetery

title: Vinicius: Eight years at Real Madrid, 20 cases of alleged racist abuse

title: Benfica allege 'defamation campaign' after Vinicius accuses Prestianni of racial abuse
content: Benfica claim there is a "defamation campaign" against Gianluca Prestianni as Uefa launch an investigation into claims he racially abused Real Madrid's Vinicius Jr.

title: Leicester appoint Rowett until end of season
content: Championship strugglers Leicester City confirm former player Gary Rowett as their new manager on a deal until the end of the season.
